definitionGroups.group: (Canada, US) The fruit of the wax myrtle shrub; or the plant itself (Morella cerifera), with aromatic, leathery leaves and waxy berries.

entries.meaning: Other species in the family Myricaceae, especially in genus Myrica; bay-rum tree, candleberry.
The fruit of the bay laurel (Laurus nobilis).
examples: [T]heir shape was much like a Figg, but very much smaller, some being about the bigness of a Bay-berry, others, and the biggest, of a Hazel-Nut.

entries.meaning: West Indian bay tree (Pimenta racemosa), a tropical American shrub with aromatic leaves that are used in the preparation of bay rum.
